wikipedia_page.main: Richard Jefferies  (born 26 February 1987) is a British sprint canoeist. Born in Bembridge, Isle of Wight he competed in the Men's C-1 200 metres and C-1 1000 metres at the 2012 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2012 Summer Olympics

response: * Richard Jefferies (curator) (born 1945), English curator of the Watts Gallery, 1985–2006
* Richard Jefferies (screenwriter) (born 1956), American screenwriter, film producer, film director and editor
* Richard Jefferies (businessman) (1920–2013), Australian Army officer and businessman
